section_title: CARBON DIOXIDE CAPTURE AND STORAGE IN THE CDM :
sentences: This agenda item (FCCC/SBSTA/2011/4, FCCC/SBSTA/2011/MISC.10 and 11) was taken up in the SBSTA plenary on 29 November and then addressed in a contact group co-chaired by Pedro Martins Barata (Portugal) and Andrea García Guerrero (Colombia).
On 3 December, the SBSTA adopted conclusions and forwarded a draft decision for consideration by CMP.

On 8 December, during an informal stocktaking plenary, SBSTA Chair Muyungi said that after consultations, compromise had been reached on carbon capture and storage (CCS) in the CDM, while project-specific reserve and transboundary issues were referred to SBSTA 36.
On 9 December the CMP adopted a decision.
